scMiko 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get branch-specific pseudotimes from diffusion map

dpt_for_branch.Rd

Get branch-specific pseudotimes from diffusion map. Adopted from destiny package.

dpt_for_branch(dpt, branch_id)

Value

numeric vector; pseudotimes

See also

DPT

Examples


# PCA embedding
so.pca <- so.query@reductions[["pca"]]@cell.embeddings

#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'so.query' not found

# diffusion map
dm <- DiffusionMap(so.pca, n_eigs = 50)

#> Error in DiffusionMap(so.pca, n_eigs = 50): could not find function "DiffusionMap"

# diffusion pseudotime
dpt <- DPT(dm, tips =tip.cluster)

#> Error in DPT(dm, tips = tip.cluster): could not find function "DPT"

# flatten
dpt_flat <- branch_divide(dpt, divide = 1)

#> Error in branch_divide(dpt, divide = 1): could not find function "branch_divide"

# get branch specific pseudotime
pt_vec <- dpt_for_branch(dpt_flat, branch_id = paths_to)

#> Error in dpt_for_branch(dpt_flat, branch_id = paths_to): object 'dpt_flat' not found
